articles.author: Sam Varghese
articles.title: Microsoft issues additional patch to fix Zerologon vulnerability - iTWire
articles.description: Microsoft has released an additional patch to fix the Zerologon vulnerability that surfaced last year, having first issued a patch for the flaw in August 2020 and then updated it the following month.
